name: WONDERFUL Flushable Wipes, Unscented 100% Plant-Based Wet Butt Wipe for Adults & Kids, Sewer Septic Safe, Gentle for Sensitive Skin, Wipes Flushable Pack for Bathroom & Travel, 6-Pack (360 Counts)
short_description: 💧 FRAGRANCE FREE & PREMIUM QUALITY: Wonderful Flushable Wipes are great alternative or supplement to toilet paper. Our unscented butt flushable wipes are made with superb quality of plant-based fibers, providing a refreshing, clean feel and your butt can stay cool. Designed for adults, kids, feminine, babies, dudes use, pets safe.

🌐 THOUGHTFULLY MADE: Made from 100% plant-sourced fibers and over 99% water, our hypoallergenic flushable wipes are plastic-free and cruelty-free, no alcohol & paraben added. Carefully tested for compatibility with all skin types. Enriched with vitamins and aloe to soothe and protect, they are perfect for bathroom use and versatile enough for general personal cleansing anywhere.

💗 EXTRA-LARGE & CONVENIENT: Each butt wipe measures 6.3 x 7.8 inches, providing full coverage for superior cleaning. Fold them for multiple uses without needing a stack of wipes. Each order includes 6 packs (360 wipes total), making it perfect for both family and travel needs. The flip-top lid ensures every wet wipe stays moist from the first to the last.

👍 SAFE TO FLUSH & NO MORE TOILET PAPER: WONDERFUL Flushable Wipes meet INDA GD4 and IWSFG Flushability Guidelines. They are sewer and septic-safe, and begin to break down immediately upon flushing, offering a worry-free clean. For best results, flush one wipe at a time and do not exceed two wipes per flush.

🎉 SOFT & DURABLE: Enjoy the ultimate in comfort and quality. WONDERFUL Flushable Wipes are super soft on the skin yet sturdy and tear-resistant, offering the perfect combination for your hygiene needs.

name: Nice 'N CLEAN Extra Large Flushable Wipes | 40% Larger Wipes | 6.8" x 7.5" Unscented XL Adult Wet Wipes | Septic and Sewer Safe | Fragrance Free, Hypoallergenic, Plant Based | 180 Butt Wipes
short_description: REFRESHING AND SOOTHING BATHROOM EXPERIENCE: Nice N' CLEAN XL Flushable Wipes deliver a fresher, cleaner feeling instead of using toilet paper alone! Ideal for on-the-go use or at home, these unscented wipes are perfect for adults, kids, men and women.
40% LARGER WIPES: Our extra large wet wipes (6.8" x 7.5") are 40% larger than our standard wipes (6.8" x 5.3"), offering the same comfort and strength with more surface area for a superior clean.

GENTLE ON THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: Used on your most sensitive areas, these XL wipes are dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic, plant based, and fragrance free. Infused with moisturizing Aloe and Vitamin E to treat your delicate skin.

NONE OF THE JUNK FOR YOUR TRUNK: Because your tush deserves the nicest and the cleanest, our butt wipes are always cruelty-free, plastic-free, paraben-free, dye-free, chemical binder-free, and phthalate-free while being proudly made in the USA.

SAFE TO FLUSH: With EcoFlush technology, feel confident and have peace of mind flushing one wipe at a time. Safe for well-maintained sewers and septic systems. Not recommended for use with motor home or basement pump systems.
product_description: Elevate your bathroom experience with Nice 'N CLEAN Extra Large Flushable Wipes, designed for those who demand a truly refreshing clean. These XL wet wipes are 40% bigger than our standard wipes, offering more surface area for a superior, all-around clean. Whether at home or on-the-go, these wipes are perfect for adults, kids, and everyone in between. Rest easy knowing that our wipes are free from harmful ingredients—cruelty-free, plastic-free, paraben-free, dye-free, and phthalate-free—making them a safe and responsible choice for your most delicate and sensitive skin. With EcoFlush technology, you can confidently flush one wipe at a time, knowing they are safe for well-maintained sewers and septic systems (please avoid use with motor home or basement pump systems). The moisture-lock flip-top lid ensures your wipes stay fresh and ready to use every time. Treat your tush to the nicest and cleanest — because you deserve nothing less!

With every Summer’s Eve product you use, know that We See You, We Get You, We Got You.

product_description: The perfect potty-training sidekick! Little Flushable Wipes are designed to give toddler’s a fresh and easy clean. Our hypoallergenic, pediatrician-tested wipes are designed for toddler’s tiny hands and are easy to carry for on-the-go cleanups.
